name: Maiden of Blue Tears
text: If your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) and you control a Link Monster: Target 1 of those Summoned monsters; destroy it, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to half its original ATK. If either player takes effect damage while this card is in your GY: You can banish this card, then target 1 Normal Spell in your GY or banishment; Set it, but it cannot be activated this turn. You can only use 1 "Maiden of Blue Tears" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
